content: Note that IHE has published FHIR R4 conformance references for many IHE Profiles (aka Implementation Guides). See https://healthcaresecprivacy.blogspot.com/2019/07/ihe-profiles-on-fhir-r4-now-have.html
Nice! Are they published in a human readable form somewhere (IG publisher/Simplifier)?
The normative specifications from IHE are the supplements (IHE Profiles) where these are in human readable format.
we are working with Grahame to use the IG publisher in the future.
